name: Tabletop Shuffleboard
description:
All the fun of traditional tabletop shuffleboard, available anywhere, including in augmented reality!

Featuring realistic physics and graphics, this is the closest you can get to playing the real thing. Whether you're a seasoned pro or new to the sport, our game offers a variety of modes to suit your style:

~ One Player vs AI Opponents - Challenge yourself against a variety of styles and difficulty levels.
~ Two Player vs a Friend - Share your phone or tablet to play against a friend next to you.
~ Two Player Online - Play a unique turn-based game against anyone, anywhere.
~ Target Practice - Fast-paced shootout action to hone your skills.
~ Open Practice - Throw as may pucks as you want.

Complete the daily challenge to earn coins, then use those coins to unlock custom puck skins and backgrounds.

Play online against friends in a unique turnbased version of shuffle board, similar to correspondence chess or bowling. Take two shots, send some emojis, and then sit back and wait. Win matches to climb the leaderboards and become the ultimate shuffle board champion!

For added realism, turn on augmented reality mode. A real table will appear in front of you, allowing you to take the fun of real shuffleboard with you anywhere.

If you like playing shuffleboard, or love pub games like darts, billiards, or air hockey, then Tabletop Shuffleboard is the ultimate game for you!
